abilities.description: When you attack in melee with a deadly weapon in a dancing whirlwind, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} +edge (instead of iron). If you do, add +1. On a hit, inflict harm (instead of 2) and take +1 momentum.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} +edge by nimbly dodging your foe's attacks, add +1. On a hit, choose one.

  • Feed the fervor: Take +1 momentum.
  • Reposition: You have the initiative.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge by performing an impressive battle dance to intimidate or maneuver into position, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
